column4: hey whats the best way to upgrade a feisty server to latest version
feisty?  How hard is it to reinstall?
to get from feisty to hardy, you have to go feisty (EOL) -> Gutsy (EOL) -> Hardy
yeah not that hard just the backing up and all the configs etc but I think your right it would be easier to reinstall system is not remote its right next to me
